Text:
Because it's a cam, the film loses more than a little of it's character. But the video is watchable and still enjoyable :) 5.5-6/10. Audio isn't great and I couldn't really turn it up due to the scratchiness of the sound so 4/10.

Great movie otherwise. There's some parts that feel a bit rushed and lacking(mainly the middle of the movie), but the ending sequence does its job in wrapping things up and leaving me glad I watched it.

Only other thing I'd like to mention is that little kids may not enjoy this, as it is a bit scary at times :/
